then.line: Minty likes a challenge. Gimme the cactus.
Really? I mean, this cactus is kinda just a plant I got, it's not really meant for sandwiches...
No, I think it's what she usually gets.
I mean, if you say so! Guess it'll help her stay sharp!
Ha! Definitely! It's a perfectly good thing to put in this sandwich.
Co-signed!
But she'll need a nice smooth condiment to balance out the spikes. What'll it be?
One order of cauli-flower to give my border collie power!
Wait, is Minty a border collie? Maybe I been picturin' the wrong dog...
Oh, uh... no. No, it just-- cauli-flower was the best rhyme.
I like word games a lot!
Ha! Me too, Prota. Me too.
So I guess all I need now is your choice of condi-minty!
Yaaaay!
Hmmmm...Lettuce!
Lettuce LETS US make the best sandwiches for Minty!
Whoa! Lettuce DOES sound a lot like "let us".
I tell ya. They don't teach you stuff like this in med school! You're a real gem.
Thanks, Doc!
Now... Lettuce finish this sandwich with some condiments!
